app.components.Ad.cantDisplayMedia: Facebook does not allow us to display <abbr title="The Ad Library API states: Note that you cannot currently download a batch of rendered ads, however you can download ad creative such as images and text for an individual ad. We are assessing ways to access that content. Help welcome!">directly</abbr> the image or video presented with this ad
app.containers.Ads.counter: {count} <abbr title="We are building a classification interface. Until it is ready, we display random ads to offer a better overview of available content considering the large amount of duplicate ads.">random</abbr> advertisements
app.containers.Ads.description:
Facebook has been allowing users to query its advertising library since the beginning of May to access political and public interest debate ads that have been posted on Facebook or Instagram.
Unfortunately, there is not yet a detailed report for countries in Europe other than the United Kingdom. Until these reports are made available, and since access to this library requires a cumbersome procedure, we want to make as many of these advertisements as possible available to any citizen so that everyone can be sure of their legality before the European elections
app.containers.Ads.title: Check whether political advertisements comply with the law
